info.name: YMA Express API - Updated
info.description: Comprehensive API collection for YMA Express application, with updated admin order routes and dynamic token management.

item.name: Authentication & Authorization
item.description: Endpoints for user registration, login, token refresh, password management, and user profiles.

request.description: Register a new user account. Supports optional photo upload.
Log in as an admin and automatically save access and refresh tokens to environment variables.
Log in as a regular user and automatically save access and refresh tokens to environment variables.
Obtain new access and refresh tokens using an existing refresh token. Automatically updates environment variables.
Initiate password reset process. Sends a reset token to the user's email.
Submit new password with a valid reset token.
Retrieve the profile of the currently authenticated user.
Update details of the currently authenticated user. Supports optional photo upload.
Change the password of the currently authenticated user.
Log out the currently authenticated user and invalidate their tokens.

item.name: Admin Management
item.description: Admin-specific endpoints for user and order management, and system statistics. Requires 'admin' or 'superadmin' role.

request.description: Get system-wide statistics (e.g., user counts by role). Requires 'admin' or 'superadmin' role.
Retrieve a paginated list of all users. Requires 'admin' or 'superadmin' role. Supports filtering and searching.
Retrieve details of a specific user by ID. Requires 'admin' or 'superadmin' role.

formdata.description: Allowed roles: user, editor, delivery, admin (superadmin only creates superadmin)

request.description: Create a new user account. Requires 'admin' or 'superadmin' role. Supports optional photo upload.
Update details of a specific user. Requires 'admin' or 'superadmin' role. Superadmins can change roles. Supports optional photo upload.
Deactivate a user account (soft delete). Requires 'admin' or 'superadmin' role. Superadmin can delete admins.
Change the role of a specific user. Requires 'superadmin' role only.
Retrieve a paginated list of all orders. Requires 'admin' or 'superadmin' role.
Retrieve details of a specific order by ID. Requires 'admin' or 'superadmin' role.
Create a new order by an admin. Requires 'admin' or 'superadmin' role.
Update an existing order's details. Requires 'admin' or 'superadmin' role.
Update the status of an existing order. Requires 'admin' or 'superadmin' role.
Delete an order. Requires 'admin' or 'superadmin' role.
Retrieve order statistics. Requires 'admin' or 'superadmin' role.
Search orders by various criteria. Requires 'admin' or 'superadmin' role.
Retrieve orders eligible for delivery reminders. Requires 'admin' or 'superadmin' role.
Trigger sending of delivery reminder emails. Requires 'admin' or 'superadmin' role.

item.name: Bookings
item.description: Endpoints for user and admin booking management.

request.description: Create a new booking. Requires user authentication.
Retrieve all bookings for the authenticated user.
Retrieve a specific booking by ID for the authenticated user.
Cancel a specific booking. Requires user authentication.
Retrieve a paginated list of all bookings. Requires 'admin' or 'superadmin' role. Supports status filtering.
Update the status of a specific booking. Requires 'admin' or 'superadmin' role.
Retrieve booking statistics. Requires 'admin' or 'superadmin' role.
Retrieve a list of upcoming deliveries. Requires 'admin' or 'superadmin' role.
Search bookings by various criteria. Requires 'admin' or 'superadmin' role.

item.name: Cart
item.description: Endpoints for managing the user's shopping cart. All require user authentication.

request.description: Retrieve the current user's shopping cart.

item.name: Cart - Add Single Item to Cart

request.description: Add a single product to the cart. Requires user authentication.

item.name: Cart - Add Multiple Items to Cart

request.description: Add multiple products to the cart. Requires user authentication.

item.name: Cart - Update Single Item in Cart

request.description: Update the quantity, dates or rental type of a single item in the cart. Requires user authentication.

item.name: Cart - Update Multiple Items in Cart

request.description: Update quantities, dates or rental types for multiple items in the cart. Quantity 0 removes the item. Requires user authentication.
Get a summary of the current user's cart (total price, total items, item details). Requires user authentication.
Remove a specific product from the cart. Requires user authentication.
Clear all items from the current user's cart. Requires user authentication.

item.name: Categories
item.description: Endpoints for managing product categories. Create/Update/Delete require 'admin', 'superadmin', or 'editor' roles.

request.description: Retrieve a list of all active categories. Publicly accessible.
Retrieve details of a specific category by ID. Publicly accessible.
Create a new product category. Requires 'admin', 'superadmin', or 'editor' role. Supports optional image upload.
Update an existing product category. Requires 'admin', 'superadmin', or 'editor' role. Supports optional image upload.
Delete a product category. Requires 'admin', 'superadmin', or 'editor' role.

item.name: Checkout
item.description: Endpoints for placing orders from the cart. Requires user authentication.

request.description: Create a new order from the current user's cart. Requires user authentication.

item.name: Inventory
item.description: Admin-specific endpoints for managing product inventory. Requires 'admin' or 'superadmin' role.

request.description: Create a new inventory item for a product on a specific date. Requires 'admin' or 'superadmin' role.
Retrieve all inventory items, with optional filters. Requires 'admin' or 'superadmin' role.

item.name: Inventory - Get Inventory Item by ID

request.description: Retrieve a specific inventory item by ID. Requires 'admin' or 'superadmin' role.
Update an existing inventory item. Requires 'admin' or 'superadmin' role.
Delete an inventory item. Requires 'admin' or 'superadmin' role.
Get available inventory for a product within a date range. Requires 'admin' or 'superadmin' role.
Get booked inventory for a product within a date range. Requires 'admin' or 'superadmin' role.
Check inventory availability for a product on a specific date. Requires 'admin' or 'superadmin' role.
Release inventory from expired pending cart items/bookings. Requires 'admin' or 'superadmin' role.

item.name: Invoices
item.description: Endpoints for managing and generating invoices. Requires authentication, and some are admin-specific.

request.description: Create a new invoice. Requires 'admin', 'superadmin', or 'editor' role.
Retrieve all invoices. Requires 'admin', 'superadmin', or 'editor' role.
Retrieve a specific invoice by ID. Requires 'admin', 'superadmin', or 'editor' role.

item.name: Invoices - Get Invoices by Booking ID

request.description: Retrieve invoices associated with a specific booking ID. Requires 'admin', 'superadmin', or 'editor' role.
Update an existing invoice. Requires 'admin', 'superadmin', or 'editor' role.
Delete an invoice. Requires 'superadmin' role only.
Generate and view an HTML invoice for a specific booking. Requires 'admin', 'superadmin', or 'editor' role.
Generate a custom invoice from provided details. Requires 'admin' or 'superadmin' role.

item.name: Locations
item.description: Endpoints for managing geographical locations. Some are public, others require admin roles.

query.description: Filter by location type (country, state, city, landmark)

request.description: Retrieve a list of all locations, with optional filters and search. Publicly accessible.
Retrieve details of a specific location by ID. Publicly accessible.

body.raw:
{
    "name": "New Location",
    "type": "landmark",
    "country": "UK",
    "state": "England",
    "city": "Manchester",
    "fullAddress": "1 Example Road, Manchester",
    "coordinates": {
        "lat": 53.4808,
        "lng": -2.2426
    },
    "description": "A new landmark location",
    "isActive": true
}

request.description: Create a new location. Requires 'admin', 'superadmin', or 'editor' role.
Update an existing location. Requires 'admin', 'superadmin', or 'editor' role.
Delete a location. Requires 'admin', 'superadmin', or 'editor' role.

item.name: Mail
item.description: Endpoint for sending contact form emails. Publicly accessible.

request.description: Send a contact form email to the site administrator. Publicly accessible.

item.name: Products
item.description: Endpoints for managing products. Get endpoints are public, others require 'admin', 'superadmin', or 'editor' roles.

request.description: Retrieve a paginated list of all active and in-stock products. Publicly accessible. Supports filtering.
Retrieve details of a specific product by ID. Publicly accessible.
Retrieve products available in a specific state. Publicly accessible.
Retrieve a list of all states where products are available. Publicly accessible.
Retrieve a limited list of featured products. Publicly accessible.
Search for products by name, description, summary, or location. Publicly accessible.
Retrieve products belonging to a specific category. Publicly accessible.

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Giant Bouncy Castle",
    "description": "A super fun bouncy castle for all ages!",
    "summary": "Giant fun for everyone.",
    "price": 150,
    "perDayPrice": 120,
    "perWeekPrice": 600,
    "deliveryAndCollection": "Free delivery within 10 miles",
    "duration": "Full Day",
    "maxGroupSize": 10,
    "difficulty": "easy",
    "categories": ["<CATEGORY_ID>"],
    "images": ["http://example.com/image1.jpg", "http://example.com/image2.jpg"],
    "imageCover": "http://example.com/cover.jpg",
    "location": {
        "state": "England",
        "city": "London"
    },
    "dimensions": {
        "length": 15,
        "width": 12,
        "height": 10
    },
    "availableFrom": "2024-07-20T09:00:00Z",
    "availableUntil": "2025-07-20T17:00:00Z",
    "stock": 5,
    "isSensitive": false,
    "material": "PVC",
    "design": "Castle Theme",
    "ageRange": {
        "min": 3,
        "max": 12,
        "unit": "years"
    },
    "safetyFeatures": ["Reinforced seams", "Safety netting"],
    "qualityAssurance": {
        "isCertified": true,
        "certification": "EN14960",
        "warrantyPeriod": "1 Year"
    }
}

request.description: Create a new product. Requires 'admin', 'superadmin', or 'editor' role.
Update an existing product. Requires 'admin', 'superadmin', or 'editor' role.
Deactivate a product (soft delete). Requires 'admin' or 'superadmin' role.
Update the stock quantity of a product. Requires 'admin' or 'superadmin' role.

item.name: User Orders
item.description: Endpoints for authenticated users to view their own orders.

request.description: Retrieve all orders placed by the authenticated user.

item.name: User Orders - Get My Specific Order

request.description: Retrieve details of a specific order placed by the authenticated user. Ensure the ORDER_ID belongs to the user.

variable.description: Generated by login requests (Admin or Superadmin)
Generated by login requests (Admin or Superadmin)
ID of a sample user, set by login requests
Placeholder for an inventory item ID
Placeholder for a user's order ID
